name: Coloroid
description:
Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • Space to jump
  • C or Left Control to crouch (this is a toggle, no need to hold down the key)
  • 1,2,4,5,6,8,9,0 each selects a different colors (if unlocked)
  • Left/Right Mouse Button to cause a color surge around you
  • Escape opens the pause menu

Teamname: One Man Games

Platform: Windows

Content that was created before the jam:

  • None

Special categories applied for:

  • Army of One
